channel.title: Comments on: Rashid’s Facebook Like Box Plugin for WordPress
channel.description: Don't document the program; program the document.

item.title: By: h4x0r
item.dc:creator: h4x0r
item.description: nice plugin, but your face as plugin icon is disturbing :)
item.content:encoded: nice plugin, but your face as plugin icon is disturbing ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The pictures are not controlled by this plugin, you need to check it with facebook.
item.content:encoded: The pictures are not controlled by this plugin, you need to check it with facebook.

item.title: By: Arnout
item.dc:creator: Arnout
item.description:
Hi Rashid,
The plugin doesm't show al of the pictures anymore. Can you check what goes wrong?
Greetings
Arnout
item.content:encoded:
Hi Rashid,

The plugin doesm’t show al of the pictures anymore. Can you check what goes wrong?

Greetings

Arnout

item.title: By: Johnny
item.dc:creator: Johnny
item.description:
Do you know if there is any way to change how many faces show? With my width being about 235px, I need to show only 8 faces if possible.
Great plugin!
item.content:encoded:
Do you know if there is any way to change how many faces show? With my width being about 235px, I need to show only 8 faces if possible.

Great plugin!

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Hi Christian,
Thanks for using my plugin. I hope it will help you. For the border issue you need to check with facebook.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Christian,

Thanks for using my plugin. I hope it will help you. For the border issue you need to check with facebook.

item.title: By: Christian
item.dc:creator: Christian
item.description:
Hej Rashid (I had a school friend years ago from Morocco with the same name, but that's another story),
Like your Plugin, works fine for me. Only one tiny problem: The bottom border is missing for some strange reason and does not want to appear. Maybe a bug? Any idea what could be wrong? http://www.zockt.com/vonguteneltern/
Greets from Berlin, Germany.
item.content:encoded:
Hej Rashid (I had a school friend years ago from Morocco with the same name, but that’s another story),

Like your Plugin, works fine for me. Only one tiny problem: The bottom border is missing for some strange reason and does not want to appear. Maybe a bug? Any idea what could be wrong? http://www.zockt.com/vonguteneltern/

Greets from Berlin, Germany.

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Hi Lin,
It has been fixed. Please update your plugin.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Lin,

It has been fixed. Please update your plugin.

item.title: By: Lin
item.dc:creator: Lin
item.content:encoded:
Hi Rashid, thanks for the plugin. Another person has also asked this question and I can’t see an answer – How do you get the title to not show? In the settings, the title field is blank but it still shows the title “Facebook Likes”
Cheers
Lin

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Hey Frank, Thanks for reporting this bug, as of now you can enter your border colour as red, green, blue, etc or prepend %23 before hex code, for example, %23FF0000 (for red).
I will fix this soon.
item.content:encoded:
Hey Frank,
Thanks for reporting this bug, as of now you can enter your border colour as red, green, blue, etc or prepend %23 before hex code, for example, %23FF0000 (for red).

I will fix this soon.

item.title: By: Frank Saiman
item.dc:creator: Frank Saiman
item.description:
Hey Rashid,
the Border color does not work in your script. Is there any update planed?
Greetings Frank
item.content:encoded:
Hey Rashid,

the Border color does not work in your script. Is there any update planed?

Greetings
Frank
